sentences.en: Design should recognize that burner flame length shortens and intensity of radiation increases as pressure increases.
sentences.cn: 设计时必须认识到当压力增加时火焰的长度缩短而辐射强度增加.

sentences.en: Dozens of cases were put on the back burner.
sentences.cn: 大量的案件被搁置起来.

sentences.en: For 10 years she has looked after her three children with her career very much on the back burner.
sentences.cn: 十年来她一直都在照顾自己的三个孩子，基本上把事业搁在了一边。

sentences.en: He put the frying pan on the gas burner.
sentences.cn: 他把煎锅放在煤气灶上。

sentences.en: he wants the matter to &B{be put on the back burner}.
Ignite the magnesium ribbon using a micro burner.
Man, why do you get such an oil burner?
sentences.cn: 老兄, 你怎么弄这么一辆费油的车?

sentences.en: More reliable performance is assured by the Alcorn burner design.
sentences.cn: 用阿尔康设计的烧嘴可以保证更可靠的工艺指标.

sentences.en: She says she has put all her other projects on the back burner for a while until she finishes writing her new novel.
sentences.cn: 她说,在她的新长篇小说脱稿之前,她把其他一切事情都束之高阁了.

sentences.en: The development of burner and the relevant theory are presented.
sentences.cn: 摘要简要叙述了煅燃烧器的发展历史,以及相应的理论成果.

sentences.en: The feed - pipe is as clean as a whistle, so I'm afraid, if the oil is not getting through to the burner, the valve must be faulty.
sentences.cn: 送料管干干净净, 所以我担心要是油不通过喷嘴, 阀门一定有毛病.

sentences.en: The organic layer in the neck of the flask is aspirated into the atomic absorption burner.
sentences.cn: 满至烧瓶颈部的有机层被抽吸进入原子吸收燃烧器中.

sentences.en: The whole project has been put on the back burner.
sentences.cn: 整顿工程已久置于不优先地位.

sentences.en: Then, with a Bunsen burner, the surface is thoroughly seared.
sentences.cn: 然后, 用本生灯彻底烧灼表面.

sentences.en: They had to remove the ashes from the burner first.
sentences.cn: 他们得先把炉内的灰清除掉.

sentences.en: Winston lit the burner and set a pan of water to boil.
sentences.cn: 温斯顿点起炉子,盛一锅水架上烧开.

words.tran_cn: 燃烧（burn的过去式、过去分词形式）
燃烧；烧毁，灼伤；激起…的愤怒
[热][化工]燃烧器；火炉；燃烧炉；灯头

phrases.tran_cn: 次要地位；多眼炉子的后炉眼
n. 喷灯嘴；燃烧器喷嘴
n. 陶瓷燃烧器（喷嘴）；陶瓷浇嘴
煤炭燃烧器；粉煤燃烧嘴
煤气灯，煤气喷灯；煤气炉
(非正式)处于次要（或主要）地位的

trans.tran_cn: 炉子，燃烧器，（火炉、煤油灯等的）灯口，烧制者，灯光
trans.tran_en: one of the round parts on the top of a cooker that produce heat
